pkgmetadata.longdescription: [![PyPI](https://badge.fury.io/py/mistat.svg)](https://pypi.org/project/dmba/)[![PyPI - Python Version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/mistat)](https://pypi.org/project/mistat/)![Python](https://github.com/gedeck/mistat/actions/workflows/build.yml/badge.svg)# Modern Statistics: A Computer Based Approach with Python# Industrial Statistics: A Computer Based Approach with PythonCollection of utility functionsInstall the `mistat` package using ```pip3 install mistat```## Notebooks and solutionsFor instructions to install a python environment and access to notebooks and solutions go to https://github.com/gedeck/mistat-code-solutions
